chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
Aeq_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (k l : list A) (a : A), no_dup k = a :: l -> ~ In a l

Premises:
no_dup = fun l : list A => list_rec (fun _ : list A => list A) nil (fun (a : A) (_ rec : list A) => if in_dec Aeq_dec a rec then rec else a :: rec) l : list A -> list A Arguments no_dup _%list_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In_list_remove3 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a l -> a <> b -> In a (list_remove A Aeq_dec b l)
In_list_remove1 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> In a l
In_list_remove2 : forall (A : Set) (Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a b : A) (l : list A), In a (list_remove A Aeq_dec b l) -> a <> b
list_remove : forall A : Set, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> list A
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Set Aeq_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} |- Type]
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}
not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (x a : A) (l : list A), ~ In x (a :: l) < -> x <> a /\ ~ In x l
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ a :: nil = y ++ b :: nil -> x = y /\ a = b
incl_Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l u v : list A), ~ In a l -> incl (a :: l) v -> Add a u v -> incl l u
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
Bool.orb_prop : forall a b : bool, (a || b)%bool = true -> a = true \/ b = true
NoDup_Add : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> NoDup l' < -> NoDup l /\ ~ In a l
NoDup_remove_2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> ~ In a (l ++ l')
no_dup2 : forall (a : A) (l : list A), In a (no_dup l) -> In a l
no_dup1 : forall (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> In a (no_dup l)
NoDup_cons_iff : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), NoDup (a :: l) < -> ~ In a l /\ NoDup l
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
NoDup_remove : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l') /\ ~ In a (l ++ l')
hd_error_tl_repr : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A) (r : list A), hd_error l = Some a /\ tl l = r < -> l = a :: r
rev_unit : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), rev (l ++ a :: nil) = a :: rev l
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
nth_S_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d a : A), In (nth n l d) l -> In (nth (S n) (a :: l) d) (a :: l)
in_nil : forall (A : Type) (a : A), ~ In a nil
in_eq : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (a :: l)

```coq
intros k l a H1 H2. intro H3. apply nodup_inv in H1. apply (in_inv _ _ _ _ H3) in H2 as [H2a | H2b].
- subst. contradict H2. apply in_eq.
- apply (no_dup1 _ _ H2b) in H1. contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros k l a H1 H2. intro H3. apply nodup_inv in H1. apply (in_inv _ _ _ _ H3) in H2 as [H2a | H2b]. - subst. contradict H2. apply in_eq. - apply (no_dup1 _ _ H2b) in H1. contradiction.
